ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
ConsoleApp/ColorShapeLinks/TextBased/App/HumanThinker.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using System.Threading;
11 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
12 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
13 
14 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App
15 {
19  public class HumanThinker : AbstractThinker
20  {
21  // Currently selected column
22  private int selectedCol;
23 
24  // Currently selected shape
25  private PShape selectedShape;
26 
29  public override void Setup(string str)
30  {
31  selectedCol = Cols / 2;
32  selectedShape = PShape.Round;
33  Console.Clear();
34  Console.WriteLine("\n\n\n");
35  }
36 
42  public override FutureMove Think(Board board, CancellationToken ct)
43  {
44  // By default, no move is performed in case of timeout
45  FutureMove move = FutureMove.NoMove;
46 
47  // No thinking notification has taken place
48  DateTime lastNotificationTime = DateTime.MinValue;
49 
50  // Set thinking notification interval between frames to 20ms
51  TimeSpan notificationInterval = TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(20);
52 
53  // Calculate the time limit for the human to play
54  DateTime timeLimit =
55  DateTime.Now + TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(TimeLimitMillis);
56 
57  // Show some info on what keys are used for input
58  OnThinkingInfo("T to toggle piece, < > to change selected column");
59 
60  // If a certain type of piece is not available, make the other
61  // type the selected one
62  if (board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Round) == 0)
63  selectedShape = PShape.Square;
64  if (board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Square) == 0)
65  selectedShape = PShape.Round;
66 
67  // If the current column is full, iterate column selection until
68  // one is not
69  while (board.IsColumnFull(selectedCol))
70  {
71  selectedCol++;
72  if (selectedCol >= Cols)
73  selectedCol = 0;
74  }
75 
76  // Wait for human input at most until the cancellation token is
77  // activated
78  while (true)
79  {
80  // Was a key pressed?
81  if (Console.KeyAvailable)
82  {
83  // Retrieve key
84  ConsoleKey key = Console.ReadKey().Key;
85 
86  // Check if it was a column increment key
87  if (key == ConsoleKey.RightArrow
88  || key == ConsoleKey.D
89  || key == ConsoleKey.NumPad6
90  || key == ConsoleKey.D6)
91  {
92  // Increment column...
93  do
94  {
95  // ...making sure a full column is not selectable,
96  // and wraping around
97  selectedCol++;
98  if (selectedCol >= Cols)
99  selectedCol = 0;
100  } while (board.IsColumnFull(selectedCol));
101  }
102  // Check if it was a column decrement key
103  else if (key == ConsoleKey.LeftArrow
104  || key == ConsoleKey.A
105  || key == ConsoleKey.NumPad4
106  || key == ConsoleKey.D4)
107  {
108  // Decrement column...
109  do
110  {
111  // ...making sure a full column is not selectable,
112  // and wraping around
113  selectedCol--;
114  if (selectedCol < 0)
115  selectedCol = Cols - 1;
116  } while (board.IsColumnFull(selectedCol));
117  }
118  // Check if it was a piece toggle key
119  else if (key == ConsoleKey.T)
120  {
121  // Toggle piece if the other type of piece is available
122  if (selectedShape == PShape.Round
123  && board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Square) > 0)
124  {
125  selectedShape = PShape.Square;
126  }
127  else if (selectedShape == PShape.Square
128  && board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Round) > 0)
129  {
130  selectedShape = PShape.Round;
131  }
132  }
133  // Check if it was a piece drop key
134  else if (key == ConsoleKey.Enter)
135  {
136  // Drop piece and get out of the input loop
137  move = new FutureMove(selectedCol, selectedShape);
138  break;
139  }
140  }
141 
142  // If cancellation token is activated, terminate input loop
143  if (ct.IsCancellationRequested)
144  {
145  break;
146  }
147 
148  // Is it time for another thinking notification?
149  if (DateTime.Now > lastNotificationTime + notificationInterval)
150  {
151  // Show dialog
152  Console.CursorLeft = 0;
153  Console.Write(String.Format(
154  "Col [{0,4}] | Shape [{1,7}] | Time [{2,14}]",
155  selectedCol,
156  selectedShape,
157  timeLimit - DateTime.Now));
158  Console.CursorLeft = 0;
159 
160  // Update last notification time
161  lastNotificationTime = DateTime.Now;
162  }
163  }
164 
165  // Return chosen move
166  return move;
167  }
168  }
169 }
ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI.AbstractThinker
The actual AI code of specific AIs should be placed in classes which extend this class.
